item.title: In-depth comparison between the optimization algorithms implemented
item.dc:creator: Juan Redondo
item.description: On this post I am going to show a comparison between the different optimization algorithms implemented till now in CTLearn, all of them applied to the same telescope and with the same configuration. This is useful to find the similarities and differences between optimization methods, as well as chec ...READ MORE...

item.title: Implementation of Gaussian Processes based Bayesian Optimization
item.dc:creator: Juan Redondo
item.description: During this weeks I have been working mainly on the implementation of the Gaussian Processes based Bayesian Optimization using the scikit-optimize package (also known as skopt).Regarding the hyperparameter space, this implementation only supports uniform, quniform, loguniform and choice options, whi ...READ MORE...

item.title: Community Bonding Period

item.description: Hi everyone, my name is Juan, I am a fourth-year physics student at Universidad Complutense de Madrid and I have been selected to work with CTLearn under the Open Astronomy organization for this GSOC edition.First, I would like to give a brief overview of the scientific and technical background of t ...READ MORE...
